content: @simulacrum you've probably noticed just from all the notifications :laughing: I took a look at some old bootstrap issues last night. How do you feel about closing https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76477 as wontfix? I think even if someone made a PR it's unlikely it would be accepted.
I agree. I think users should wrap x.py with their own script, or I know some shells support configuring a bell on long running commands or something like that
